Definition.WordDefinition: life style n : a manner of living that reflects the person's values and attitudes [syn: {life-style}, {lifestyle}, {modus vivendi}]
life-style n : a manner of living that reflects the person's values and attitudes [syn: {life style}, {lifestyle}, {modus vivendi}]
lifestyle n : a manner of living that reflects the person's values and attitudes [syn: {life style}, {life-style}, {modus vivendi}]
